II. Purpose of Addendum
MDHHS Western Wayne Office relocation.
III. Methodology
This consultant toured the building at the new location on 3/30/2016.
IV. Description of Findings and Conclusions
The new MDHHS office is located on the north side of Michigan Avenue just west of
Inkster road. There is ample and separate parking for both employees and
recipients of services. The employee lot is gated and provides a separate employee
entrance.
The building and grounds are new. Upon entry, there is a large open lobby with a
podium for security personnel and a sign-in sheet, and support staff sitting further
back behind Plexiglas. Past the lobby behind a secured door are four small
conference rooms designated for family team meetings, four private visiting rooms
with coinciding observation rooms separated by one-way mirrors, and one large
playroom/multiple family visiting room.
Beyond the public area and behind another secured door is the employee work area.
The office has new carpeting and the walls are covered with color-coordinated fresh
paint. Along the perimeter of the space, there are a few private offices, several
small private meeting rooms, a large employee lunch room, restrooms, and a large
meeting/conference room.
In the center of the space are cubicles for office staff and docking stations for
mobile/field staff. Supervisors are located together in cubicles. File cabinets and
copy machines are located throughout the space.
V. Recommendation
I recommend this facility continue their current licensing status.
